ComicInfo.Title: Playing God
ComicInfo.Summary: Jackie tries to get a grasp on his powers, he even makes an attempt making a human female out of the Darkness, although it doesn't turn out quite as he hoped for.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-23 22:42:32. [CVDB118658]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Cedric Nocon, Marc Silvestri, Stephen Platt, Steve Firchow
ComicInfo.Inker: John Livesay, Marc Silvestri, Matt Banning, Richard Bennett, Victor Llamas
ComicInfo.Colorist: Bike Kinzle, Dean White, Greg Hammond, Jonathan D. Smith, Matt Nelson, Quantum Color FX, Richard Isanove, Stephen Platt, Steve Firchow
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: D-Tron, Jonathan D. Smith, Marc Silvestri, Matt Banning, Michael Turner, Steve Firchow
ComicInfo.Teams: Darklings, New York Police Department, Yakuza
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State
